name: LafargeHolcim
short_description: LafargeHolcim Ltd provides building materials and solutions in the Asia Pacific, Europe, Latin America, the Middle East, Africa, and North America.
long_description: LafargeHolcim Ltd provides building materials and solutions in the Asia Pacific, Europe, Latin America, the Middle East, Africa, and North America. It operates in four segments: Cement, Aggregates, Ready-Mix Concrete, and Solutions & Products. The company offers cement, hydraulic binders, clinker, and other cementitious materials; aggregates, such as crushed stone, gravel, and sand; ready-mix concrete, precast construction systems, concrete products, asphalts, mortars, and other products and services; and contracting services. Its products are used in infrastructure projects, such as transport, roads, energy, and sports and cultural facilities, as well as in mining, and oil and gas industries; and building projects comprising individual housing, collective housing, office buildings, industrial and commercial buildings, and public buildings. The company also provides its products for affordable housing, and distribution and retail industries. The company was formerly known as Holcim Ltd. and changed its name to LafargeHolcim Ltd in July 2015. LafargeHolcim Ltd was founded in 1833 and is headquartered in Jona, Switzerland.
